issue.title: [CF 311] Import String have a bug
issue.body:
TMW will replace "player|harmful" to "playerarmful".

^1^T^SBindText^SFocus ^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S> ^SUnit^Sfocus ^SName^SShadow~`Word:~`Pain ^t^N2^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S> ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SShadow~`Word:~`Pain ^t^N3^T ^SType^SLUA ^SName^Sselect(7,UnitAura("target","Shadow~`Word:~`Pain",~`nil,~`"player|harmful"))-~`GetTime()>select(7,UnitAura("focus","Shadow~`Word:~`Pain",~`nil,~`"player|harmful"))-~`GetTime() ^t^t^SCustomTex^S871 ^SEnabled^B ^SName^S15407 ^t^N46301^S~` ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #311 | Raw

comments.body:
Maybe it only replace "|h", i try to use "harmful|player" to import, don't have any problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Hmmm... I do have code put in place to fix this, but I may have missed something somewhere.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Well, it turns out the the fix that I had in place was actually breaking it. Without the fix, it works fine.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
